original_text: David took the crown from the head of their king—its weight was found to be a talent of gold, and it was set with precious stones—and it was placed on David’s head. He took a great quantity of plunder from the city
korean_text: 다윗이 그 왕의 머리에서 보석 있는 왕관을 빼앗아 중량을 달아보니 금 한 달란트라 그들의 왕관을 자기 머리에 쓰니라 다윗이 또 그 성에서 노략한 물건을 무수히 내오고

sentences.original_text: David took the crown from the head of their king
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗이 그들의 왕의 머리에서 왕관을 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: its weight was found to be a talent of gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그 무게는 금 한 달란트인 것으로 알려졌습니다

sentences.original_text: and it was set with precious stones
and it was placed on David's head
He took a great quantity of plunder from the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 성에서 많은 양의 전리품을 가져왔습니다
